title: [Large-scale] Educational System Leadership and Institutional Pressure Management Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of educational system structures and organizational management
context.additional_context: Course analyzing leadership cases in public, private, and hybrid education systems to explore institutional pressure response strategies, conducted through a blended format (online theory + offline case studies/discussions)

learning_goals: Learners can classify and analyze three or more types of institutional pressures occurring in various educational systems
Learners can explain system infrastructure strategies to strengthen educational coherence through case studies
Learners can propose collaboration plans with government/non-government agencies to resolve educational equity issues
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
